description:
Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but they`ll need Luffy to even the odds!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rescuing Our Friend! Raid on the Franky House!
Sauvons notre ami ! On frappe avant d’entrer à la Franky House !
Спасти товарища! Рейд на дом Фрэнки
ช่วยพวกพ้อง! บุกถล่มแฟรงกกี้เฮ้าส์
仲間救出! 殴りこみフランキーハウス
